In bugzilla, all the components are merged as per the tracks & individual components are removed. So from now, whenever you are raising the bug, please mark the bug for your particular track/component. Individual portal/component is not there now in bugzilla. Body:
Dear HCLite,

 

Group Medical & Hospitalization Benefits Insurance
Submission of Claims | Year 2016-17

 

 

All insured employees for the current policy year 2016-17, are requested to
submit their pending medical claims till 30th September 2017 to the Medical
HelpDesk at Head Office. The last date to submit all your pending claims is
10th October 2017.

 


Please note, the New Policy Year will commence from 1st October 2017

 

In case you have any queries, write to hrservices@hcl.com

 

Regards

HR Team

Subject: Documentation of MDD requirements
Body:
Dear All,

I have been seeing a lot of requirements for MDD without any kind of concrete documentation or place where it can be tracked. As of now, nearly all of it is verbal discussion.
All requirements for MDD - be it enhancements or maintenance or review comments need to be properly documented or at least be on mail - nothing on Bugzilla or verbal. This is with immediate effect.

I have directed the dev team not to entertain any request which is not via the correct channel with immediate effect.

Also, since I am owning the track, please mark me in all communications related to requirement and delivery.

Please forward the mail if I have missed anyone

Thanks and Regards

Pankaj Kumar Choudhary
+91-9650091227

Subject: Reminder_Group Medical Insurance - Welcome mail
Body:
Dear Manish Singh Pangti,

GREETINGS FROM MEDI ASSIST!!!!! 

We are pleased to inform you that we are the Third Party Administrator for your Group Medical Insurance Policy issued by The Oriental Insurance Company Limited. You can enrol your dependents for Group Medical Coverage 2017-18 through our Online Enrolment Module. 

Last day of Enrolment is 15th October 2017.

Please do the following:

1.Login to HCL Intranet portal>>>Mediassist portal

2. Click on Policy Enrolment to begin Enrolment for current year 2017-18. 

3. Eligible members for enrolment (1 + 7): You can cover your spouse, two dependent children, dependent parents or dependent parents-in-law. Only a set of parents or parents-in-law can be enrolled, unmarried and unemployed dependent sister, unmarried and unemployed dependent brother.

4. Children will be covered till 25 years of age Only.

5. If you are sure that all dependent details are correct, you can click on Confirm button. Pop Up will appear. Click on OK in to progress further. Once you click, your data will be freezed and you will not be able to make any changes.

6.Please be sure of the data before clicking on Confirm Button.

7.You can opt for additional Top Up Cover of 1 Lac, 2 Lac, 3 Lac, 4 Lac and 5 Lac Sum Insured Option. Premium Charges as below:

Base Sum Insured Limits (Deductible to the Top Up) 

Top Up Sum Insured ( In INR Lacs) 

1 Lac

2 Lac

3 Lac

4 Lac

5 Lac

Premium (with Tax) 

3732

4682

5768

7599

10382

Top Up Premium will be deducted from your salary

THERE IS A PROVISION TO ADD NEWLY MARRIED SPOUSE & NEW BORN BABY ON THE PORTAL WITHIN 20 DAYS FROM DATE OF MARRIAGE OR DATE OF BIRTH

For any assistance in this regard, please write to hrservices@hcl.com <mailto:hrservices@hcl.com>   or hcl@mediassistindia.com <mailto:hcl@mediassistindia.com>   giving details of your name, employee ID and contact number. For any other information regarding Cashless Facility, Reimbursement Procedure or list of Network Hospitals, please visit our website www.mediassistindia.com <http://www.mediassistindia.com/> 

Medi Assist wishes you and your family "Good Health"!

Regards,

Team Medi Assist

Subject: shell script to crreate table
Body:
dbstring="mysql -usample -psample12 -Dsampledb -h127.0.0.1 -A "

echo "CREATE TABLE info (id bigint(20) NOT NULL,email varchar(128) NOT NULL,
createddate datetime DEFAULT NULL)" >> create_table.sql


$dbstring  < create_table.sql
-- 
Thanks and Regards
Vicky Kumar Jaiswal

Subject: Mail Servers Downtime Communication
Body:
cid:image001.jpg@01D2EC07.2200A700

 

Dear HClites,

 

DOWNTIME NOTIFICATION: MAIL SERVERS

 

We are undertaking some major configuration changes in HO Sendmail server
and relay servers, to enhance security of our servers. During the activity,
all mail services will be unavailable. All employees are requested to kindly
note the same and plan their activities accordingly.

 

Services Impacted

.         Exchange Mail Server

.         HO Sendmail Server

.         Singapore mail Server

 

Activity Window

Start Time:           14(Saturday) October 2017 | 08:00 PM IST

End Time:            14 (Saturday) October 2017 | 09:00 PM IST

 

In case you face any issue post completion of the activity, feel free to
contact us at: msosupport@hcl.com 

 

 

Regards,

MIS Helpdesk

0120 - 4203166

Subject: Training Calendar- Oct'17
Body:
Dear All,

Please find below training calendar for the month of Oct'17.

Important to Note:


1)      No adhoc Nominations/ participation will be considered.

2)      All nominated people if do not appear for the training without  prior information, will be treated as defaulters and strict action will be taken against them.

3)      No one will be allowed to join the training, 15 min post commencing time of the training. Also, no laptop will be allowed in training session unless training requires so.

Subject: Reminder_Group Medical Insurance - Welcome mail
Body:
Dear Manish Singh Pangti,

GREETINGS FROM MEDI ASSIST!!!!! 

We are pleased to inform you that we are the Third Party Administrator for your Group Medical Insurance Policy issued by The Oriental Insurance Company Limited. You can enrol your dependents for Group Medical Coverage 2017-18 through our Online Enrolment Module. 

Last day of Enrolment is 15th October 2017.

Please do the following:

1.Login to HCL Intranet portal>>>Mediassist portal

2. Click on Policy Enrolment to begin Enrolment for current year 2017-18. 

3. Eligible members for enrolment (1 + 7): You can cover your spouse, two dependent children, dependent parents or dependent parents-in-law. Only a set of parents or parents-in-law can be enrolled, unmarried and unemployed dependent sister, unmarried and unemployed dependent brother.

4. Children will be covered till 25 years of age Only.

5. If you are sure that all dependent details are correct, you can click on Confirm button. Pop Up will appear. Click on OK in to progress further. Once you click, your data will be freezed and you will not be able to make any changes.

6.Please be sure of the data before clicking on Confirm Button.

7.You can opt for additional Top Up Cover of 1 Lac, 2 Lac, 3 Lac, 4 Lac and 5 Lac Sum Insured Option. Premium Charges as below:

Base Sum Insured Limits (Deductible to the Top Up) 

Top Up Sum Insured ( In INR Lacs) 

1 Lac

2 Lac

3 Lac

4 Lac

5 Lac

Premium (with Tax) 

3732

4682

5768

7599

10382

Top Up Premium will be deducted from your salary

THERE IS A PROVISION TO ADD NEWLY MARRIED SPOUSE & NEW BORN BABY ON THE PORTAL WITHIN 20 DAYS FROM DATE OF MARRIAGE OR DATE OF BIRTH

For any assistance in this regard, please write to hrservices@hcl.com <mailto:hrservices@hcl.com>   or hcl@mediassistindia.com <mailto:hcl@mediassistindia.com>   giving details of your name, employee ID and contact number. For any other information regarding Cashless Facility, Reimbursement Procedure or list of Network Hospitals, please visit our website www.mediassistindia.com <http://www.mediassistindia.com/> 

Medi Assist wishes you and your family "Good Health"!

Regards,

Team Medi Assist

Dear HCLites,

Sendmail Users: Revalidate your POP3 & SMTP Settings in Outlook


We are undertaking some minor configuration changes in HO Sendmail server
for security enhancement. 

 

Given this, all Sendmail users, accessing HO Sendmail server
(mail.hclinsys.com) are requested to validate their POP3 and SMTP settings
in outlook. 

 

A step-by-step guide is attached with this email, to assist you with making
the POP3/SMPT Setting changes securely. Please note that your Outlook
settings should be same as shown in the attached guide.

Subject: UIDAI Attendance Notification
Body:
Dear Team,

 

This is to bring to your attention that employees are not spending 9 hours
in office and many a times not marking biometric attendance either on entry
or exit.  Due to this, UIDAI may show us short attendance and we may land up
with billing loss (as of now UIDAI has not done this, but as per internal
information they may do so ).  So everyone needs to spend 9 hours in office
and your biometric should record 9 hours of office stay each day.  This is
also important from the delivery point of view and customer trust building.


 

In case the biometric device is not working,  please make sure you sign the
attendance register at the respective locations, which will be submitted as
proof of record in case of non availability of the biometric data.  In case
of  billing loss due to  employee's short attendance  or partial attendance,
deduction will be made  from the employee's next month's salary. This rule
will be applicable with immediate effect. Also, all employees should record
both in time and out time via the biometric devices. In case of only either
entry or exit attendance being marked, the employee will be treated as
absent.

 

Regards,

Rajesh Patel

the individual defaulters from last week.

Rajesh Patel

Please consider the below enhancement on MDD: Face Match batch and Web service for pre-production deployment.

 

Key Features and Major Changes:

 

Implementation of Face-Match Batch and Web-service in MDD for automating the Demo(Face) check which reduces the manual efforts and process.

Subject: Training Calendar- Nov'17
Body:
Dear All,

Please find attached training Calendar for the month of Nov'17.

Important to Note:


1)      Managers to share nominations on portal on receiving system generated mail for each training.

2)      No adhoc Nominations/ participation will be considered.

3)      All nominated people if do not appear for the training without  prior information, will be treated as defaulters and strict action will be taken against them.

4)      No one will be allowed to join the training, 15 min post commencing time of the training. Also, no laptop will be allowed in training session unless training requires so.

Dear All,

 

Please find attached training Calendar for the month of Nov'17. 

 

Important to Note:

 

1)      Managers to share nominations on portal on receiving system
generated mail for each training.

2)      No adhoc Nominations/ participation will be considered.

prior information, will be treated as defaulters and strict action will be
taken against them.

Manasa

Subject: RE: Welcome - Sumit Bakshi (BU HR Head - UIDAI)
Body:
HCL Infotech 

ORGANIZATION – ANNOUNCEMENT

 

	
 Welcome Sumit Bakshi

 


 

 

 

Sumit Bakshi 

 

 


 



 

 


 

Dear Team,

I am delighted to welcome Sumit Bakshi as BU HR Head – UIDAI.  Sumit has over 12 years of varying experience in managing HR as HR business partner for large organizations. 

In his current role he was looking after the HR function for HCL Infosystems Middle East Asia  since July 2016. He will continue to oversee Middle East Asia along with the additional responsibility of leading the HR for UIDAI

Sumit has previously worked with WNS Global Services India Private Ltd , wherein he was Senior Group Manager – HR . During the course of his professional tenure, he has also worked with BA continuum India Pvt Ltd & IGATE Global Solutions Ltd.

 Sumit has completed his 2 years Post Graduate Diploma in Business Administration from Symbiosis and PG certificate in HR from XLRI.

He is a sports enthusiast and in his free time likes to spend time with his family exploring new places.

He is very excited about taking on this additional role and can be reached at +91-9811806267 or on sumit.bakshi@hcl.com

Please join me in welcoming Sumit and wish him the very best to be an important part of our GOLD STANDARDS journey ahead. He will report to me.

Regards

 

Rajiv Kumar

HEAD HR

HCL SERVICES (SD) Ltd. & HCL Infotech (SI) Ltd.

Subject: Policy Change Update | Attendance and Work Schedule Policy
Body:
cid:image001.jpg@01D2EC07.2200A700

 

Dear HCLites,

 

 

POLICY CHANGE UPDATE

Attendance & work schedule policy 

 

This is to inform you that the policy on Attendance & work schedule has been
revised and is effective immediately.

 

Key Features of the Revised Policy

(a)  Mandatory to apply attendance on half day leave else full salary will
be deducted for that day.

(b)  Maximum 8 week offs employees can opt for shift other than general in a
given calendar month

 

For more details, please refer to the policy available at
<https://intranet.hclinsys.com> https://intranet.hclinsys.com

Go to: Enable >> People Practices >> Policies and Forms >> Leave & Holidays
>> Attendance & work schedule Policy

 

In case you have any queries regarding the policy changes, kindly get in
touch with your respective BU HR SPOC.

 

Regards

HR Team

	
	



cid:image005.jpg@01D12602.B5F18730

Body:
Dear Santosh,

Enrollment release.

Keep the IAD and UTC separate , remaining INS ,RLN, RFC.. can be merged to
one.

 

Regards

Kavita

Subject: FW: Event Publishing part from each transaction
Body:
++Mandar

From: Shelendra Kandola - HCLI
Sent: Friday, September 22, 2017 5:39 PM
To: Jeetendra B N - HCLI; Manasa A - HCLI; Tony V Abraham - HCLI
Subject: Event Publishing part from each transaction

1. ServiceEvents.xsd in uidservicesmodel.

<xs:complexType name="ResidentServiceEvent">
              <xs:complexContent>
                     <xs:extension base="BaseServiceEvent">
                           <xs:sequence>
                                  <xs:element name="refId" type="xs:string" />
                                  <xs:element name="reqTimeStamp" type="xs:string"/>
                                  <xs:element name="source" type="xs:string" />
                                  <xs:element name="transName" type="xs:string" />
                                  <xs:element name="transStatus" type="xs:string" />
                                  <xs:element name="transFailureReason" type="xs:string" />
                                  <xs:element name="errorCode" type="xs:string" />
                                  <xs:element name="senderCode" type="xs:string" />
                                  <xs:element name="deviceId" type="xs:string" />
                           </xs:sequence>
                     </xs:extension>
              </xs:complexContent>
       </xs:complexType>

2. *Task.java

Populate ResidentServiceEvent POJO with correct value and publish using below lines of code in all the scenarios (SUCCESS/FAILURE).


if (clientIntegrationAppContextHelper.isBiEventPublishEnabled()) {
                                         clientIntegrationAppContextHelper.getBiEventPublishHelper().populateBIEvent(ResidentServiceEvent);
}

Thanks and Regards,
Shelender Kandola

Dear Jeetendra,

The screens looks ok. But I have a few suggestions which I have incorporated in the attached screenshots.

The App FAQs must be only about the services and should be generic. Answers should be such that doesn't get updated frequently.

For more detailed information the user should be sent to the website FAQs which is the single live repository that gets updated regularly.

For About page I am giving here some sample text. Please get appropriate content from the concerned authority.

Sample Text for About App: The Aadhaar App is a window in your mobile device for the resident of India to access various Aadhaar based services and information in a hassle free and quickest possible way. The self-service portal fulfills the Authority's vision of empowering ‘the residents of India with a unique identity and a digital platform to authenticate anytime'.

The bouquet of services hosted here is designed to provide fast, reliable and comprehensive information about their Aadhaar to the residents. The App is a result of collaborative effort of various Groups and Divisions of UIDAI that caters to the Aadhaar specific needs of the Residents. (Get this reviewed and approved by concerned authority.)

Sample text for Terms and Conditions: This App is designed, developed, maintained and its content provided by Unique Identification Authority of India (UIDAI).

Though all efforts have been made to ensure the accuracy and currency of the content on this application, the same should not be construed as a statement of law or used for any legal purposes. In case of any ambiguity or doubts, users are advised to verify/check with the Department(s) and/or other source(s), and to obtain appropriate professional advice.

Under no circumstances will this Department be liable for any expense, loss or damage including, without limitation, indirect or consequential loss or damage, or any expense, loss or damage whatsoever arising from use or loss of use of data, arising out of or in connection with the use of this application.

These terms and conditions shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the Indian Laws. Any dispute arising under these terms and conditions shall be subject to the jurisdiction of the courts of India. (Get this reviewed and approved by concerned authority.)

Regards,
Snigdha

Subject: Training Calendar- Dec'17
Body:
Dear All,

 

Please find attached training Calendar for the month of Dec'17. 

 

Important to Note:

 

1)      Managers to share nominations on portal on receiving system
generated mail for each training.

2)      No adhoc Nominations/ participation will be considered.

3)      All nominated people if do not appear for the training without
prior information, will be treated as defaulters and strict action will be
taken against them.

Subject: Regularization on HR Portal on or before 31st December 2017
Body:
Dear HCLite,

 

 

Regularization on HR Portal on or before 31st December 2017

 

 

As we draw closer to the calendar year 2017, we need to close all
regularization in the HRMyPal portal for 2017. 

 

Employees who are yet to take an approval from their respective Managers for
regularizing their absence marked in the system are thereby requested to do
the needful on or before 31st December 2017 as per the company leave policy.

 

Likewise, all managers are requested to close all regularization requests of
their respective team members for the year 2017 latest by 31st December
2017. 

 

Please note that any non-regularization beyond the above cutoff date of 31st
December 2017 will not be considered.

 

All are requested to kindly make a note of the same and comply accordingly.

 

Regards

 

Team HR

	
	


cid:image005.jpg@01D12602.B5F18730

Subject: Mail Delivery Issue - Sendmail Users
Body:
Dear HCLites,

 

 

During   migration  activity of mailing system at HCL  Technologies  , you
might not have received  some  of the  mails sent to you from  outside
domains .

This problem was noticed during period starting   6th Dec 20:00 HRS to 7th
Dec 13:30 HRS and specifically for non-Exchange Users i.e Send mail users.
Such mails bounced back to the Sender of the mail.

This problem is now resolved. However , this problem has not impacted
delivery of internal e-mails or any mail sent  by you .

 

In case, you were expecting some important mail form outside domain or
sender from HCL Technologies  during this period , you may please contact
the sender. 

 

   

 

Regards,

MIS Helpdesk

0120 - 4203166

Body:
Dear HCLite,

regularization in the HRMyPal portal for 2017.

Subject: Declaration of your income and savings details
Body:
Dear All,

 

As per income tax rules you need to declare your income and savings details
for entire year  (1st April'17 to 31st March'18 ) for correct calculation of
Income tax and TDS deduction.

 

To ensure that your income tax calculations are correct this year, you are
requested to submit  income certificate containing details of Gross Salary,
deduction, exemption and TDS deducted from all your previous employer(s) if
you have joined HCL on or after April'2017. 

 

The Income certificate should be duly signed and stamped by all your
ex-employer (s) and same is to be shared with us by 10th January'18, else we
shall  annualize the existing  salary for employment with the company for
the  purpose of tax deduction.

 

Please send your Income certificate to Deepak Tandon @ deep@hcl.com

 

 

With Regards,

Finance - Shared Services

Subject: Circular on Benefits of Long Term retention of PF Accounts
Body:
Dear HCLites,

Importance and Benefits of Long-Term retention of PF Accounts

The mail intends to inform you regarding the benefits of retaining the PF accounts for longer duration.

EPFO is a statutory body which maintains retirement fund . The retirement benefits are reciprocal to the length of contributory membership. The longer contributory service makes the subscriber/ employee eligible for the longer benefits, whereas early/premature withdrawal disables the benefits mentioned below:

1)    Loss of service membership for pensionary benefits, as minimum 10 years of continuous contributory membership is required to be eligible for pensionary benefits.

2)    Losing the opportunity of availing advances from the accumulation of self-membership fund which are available only on completion of 5 years or more contributory services.

3)    Deduction of TDS applicable if withdrawal is made before 5 years of contributory service.

4)    Withdrawal benefit is not available, if withdrawal is made through form 10-C for the service less than 6 months.

It is further recommended for employees who have resigned and are joining new organization to transfer  PF accumulation to new organization rather than withdrawing them.

Keeping in mind , benefits of long term retention of PF accounts , it is therefore advised to not make premature withdrawal and closure of PF account .

 

Regards

HR Team

Subject: Shiv Nadar Foundation's Q4 Newsletter: Words that will charm you, aspirations that will inspire you.
Body:
Five former VidhyaGyan students, aspiring to change the world around them.
<https://gallery.mailchimp.com/0f0273fde76319157b1b1db1d/images/0c0668d3-21c
3-4558-8d6a-270e2f388557.jpg> 


>From improving primary schools in their villages to revolutionizing design
industry, these VidyaGyan alumni are determined to overcome the challenges
life throws at them and make an impact on the world around them.

Subject: SAP Systems Maintenance Activity
Body:
From: mishelpdesk [mailto:mishelpdesk@hcl.com] 
Sent: Thursday, January 4, 2018 3:30 PM
To: mladmin@hcl.com
Subject: SAP Systems Maintenance Activity

 



 

cid:image001.jpg@01D2EC07.2200A700

 

Dear HClites,

 

SAP SYSTEMS MAINTENANCE ACTIVITY  

 

We are undertaking up-gradation of Windows O/S in our SAP ECC Production
systems.  During the activity, the following services will be unavailable.
All employees are requested to kindly note the same and plan their
activities accordingly.

 

Services Impacted

.         SAP ECC / CRM / BI / PI / MDM / DMS 

.         Few Services in Satellite systems like Workflow/Intranet/FFA may
also get impacted.

 

 

Activity Window

Start Time: Saturday , 06th January 2018 | 06:00 PM IST

End Time: Monday , 08th January 2018 | 08:00 AM IST

 

Once the activity is completed, we will send out a notification confirming
the completion. If in case you face any issue post completion of the
activity, feel free to contact the MIS HelpDesk.

 

Regards,

 

MIS Helpdesk

0120 - 4203166 

 <mailto:msosupport@hcl.com> msosupport@hcl.com

Subject: Training Calendar- Jan'18
Body:
Dear All,

 

Please find attached training Calendar for the month of January'18. 

 

Important to Note:

 

1)      Managers to share nominations on portal on receiving system
generated mail for each training.

2)      No adhoc Nominations/ participation will be considered.

3)      All nominated people if do not appear for the training without
prior information, will be treated as defaulters and strict action will be
taken against them.

4)      No one will be allowed to join the training, 15 min post commencing
time of the training. Also, no laptop will be allowed in training session
unless training requires so.

Subject: REMINDER - Income Certificate Required || Financial Year 17-18
Body:
Dear Vicky Kumar  Jaiswal,

 

As per Income Tax Rules, you are required to declare your income and savings
details for entire year (1st April'17 to 31st March'18) for correct
calculation of Income tax & TDS deduction.

 

As communicated earlier through e-mail dated 21st December' 2017, in order
to ensure that your income tax calculations are correct this year, you are
requested to submit  income certificate containing details of Gross Salary,
deduction, exemption and TDS deducted from all your previous employer(s) if
you have joined HCL on or after April'2017. 

 

The Income certificate should be duly signed & stamped by all your
ex-employer (s) and same is to be shared with us by 19th Feburary'18, else
we shall annualize the existing salary for employment with the company for
the purpose of tax deduction and tax will be deducted on maximum applicable
tax slab.

 

Please send your Income certificate to Deepak Tandon @ deep@hcl.com

 

Ignore this communication if you have already shared your Income
Certificate.

 

 

 

 

With Regards,

Finance - Shared Services
http://10.12.11.75:8081/artifactory/uidai-server/in/gov/uidai/uidenrlcommon/3.p213-rel.m.041/

Subject: DIRECTION 2020 : Message from the Non Executive Chairman - HCL Infosystems
Body:
April 13, 2018

Description:
http://web2byte.com/web2bytedemo/hcl/emailer/12april2018/images/hcl-logo.jpg


 


Description:
http://web2byte.com/web2bytedemo/hcl/emailer/12april2018/images/header03.jpg


	

 


Dear Colleagues,


 


Digital technologies and evolving business models are fast changing the way
technology business is being done. Growth of "as a services" model,
convergence of enterprise & consumer technologies, machine learning,
automation/robotics & data monetization are some of the key trends defining
the tech buyers' agenda with a focus on developing relevant digital
capabilities at speed and scale.


 


Charles Darwin famously said, "It is not the strongest of the species that
survives, not the most intelligent, but the one most responsive to change."
HCL Infosystems is a practical testament of this theory. In its four decades
of existence, HCL Infosystems has seen many highs as well as lows with
changing market dynamics and opportunities. In our various business segments
we have witnessed many peers and competitors folding up. But HCLI has stayed
the course and has been able to successfully ride the waves because of our
demonstrated ability to transform over and over again.


 


REFINING OUR FOCUS


 


Financial year 2017-18 was an eventful year for the Company because we took
a number of strategic decisions with a view to consolidating our businesses.
The guiding principle has been to focus on market segments & businesses that
are high growth and profitable and scale down businesses that were not
financially meaningful or were unprofitable. The divestment of our Domestic
Services businesses including Care and the MEA business has been a part of
this strategy towards consolidation of the company.


 


Our Domestic Services business was largely comprised of offerings like
Multi-Vender Technical Support, Facility Management and End User Managed
Support which were essentially low margin engagements. Over the last three
years, we tried to build this business through investments in RIM, ITOC and
emerging technology offerings like IOT and Cloud. However the progress was
slow and limited and the business consistently incurred losses over this
period. Our customers and our employees were being under served by us.
Therefore, we divested the domestic services business to Karvy who are
expected to invest and grow this business in the future. This is a win for
us, a win for Karvy, and a win for our customers, partners and employees.
Some of our peer organizations like Wipro, HPE & IBM have been exploring
similar business models by divesting / outsourcing their low margin and
commoditized businesses.


 


HCL Care Services has been divested to Quess Corp. HCL Care business has
been amongst the leading after-sales services providers for product
categories such as mobile phones, consumer electronics and consumer durables
in the customer lifecycle management space. However it was a low revenue
business with low margins and not a fit in our future business strategy.


 


The divesting of HCLI MEA to Axis Investment has been made due to an
assessment of geo-political risk impacting the economy in the region. With
the downturn in oil prices, countries in MEA have been experiencing a
challenging economic environment and slow business growth for several
quarters.


 


Again with regards to HCL Learning, the education industry in general has
been encountering tough marketing conditions with major churn in business
models of multiple organizations. Moreover, the learning business moreover
was not synergistic with future strategic growth businesses of HCLI.


 


INVESTING IN OUR FUTURE


 


The recent set of strategic actions have been strong steps towards making
HCLI a fast growing, agile, profitable and strong free cash flow company -
strongly focused and positioned for future. This is the operational template
and paradigm of most successful organizations in the world today.


 


The focus going forward would be on growing our Enterprise Distribution,
Consumer Distribution, Singapore Services businesses and successfully
managing our Systems Integration business. We are confident about being on
the right path. While there is more work to do, we are already seeing that
our strategy is working. Overall HCLI Revenue grew in FY18 to over INR
4,000+ Cr (with over 7000 people) powered by strong performance in
Enterprise & Consumer Distribution businesses. The overall operational EBIT
became positive last year in third quarter (Q3'18). The plan is to drive at
least INR 5,000 Cr+ revenue in FY 2019 (with less than 2000 People) with a
highly engaged and productive workforce.


 


Consumer Distribution (CD) business has scaled up quickly in the last two
quarters and we're focussing on building on the momentum in that business.
This business has undergone a successful transition from a single-brand to a
multi-brand distribution model and lot of our growth came from distribution
of multi brand consumer technology products of Apple, Nokia, Samsung and
Microsoft.


 


We did over INR 1,500 Cr of revenue in this business and we are expecting
over 70% growth in the next financial year. We have identified a number of
additional key brand partnerships and emerging segments like Distribution as
a Service and Direct 2 Retail that would be the growth engines of the
business going forward.


 


Enterprise Distribution (ED) business has been a success story for us and
has grown significantly over the last three years. This is a profitable
business for us with positive EBIT. In FY 18 we made over INR 1,500 Crs. in
revenue, a 32% revenue growth. We are all set to build the next phase of
growth for the ED business. This is an exciting time for the business and we
are looking at addressing a number of high growth and margin opportunities
going forward like Cloud, Hybrid Infrastructure, Network, Device as a
Service and Security.


 


HCLI Singapore (SEA) business has been another success story for us. This
business has been growing steadily and is the most profitable business for
us. During FY 18 and now in FY 19 we have made investments close to S$5 mn
in creating a new command center and in automation tools etc.to fully gear
up for significant growth. We have built great trust, relationships and
equity in Singapore and will continue to keep a strong focus on building
this business.


 


In System Integration (SI), we are strongly focused on execution which is on
track. We have a wealth of experience in SI having delivered complex nation
building projects over the years. Many of the projects that we have
delivered across the sectors have been truly world class. There are lots of
synergies between the SI and ED business and we are working towards
leveraging the strong SI skills & capabilities in pursuing complex and high
value Enterprise business opportunities.


 


We have also signed a partnership agreement with Karvy where we would
jointly pursue large market opportunities. Karvy would leverage our strong
capabilities, credentials and experience in driving some of these high value
market opportunities along with key talent from our SI teams. While our SI
team would focus on complex solution design and architecting elements of the
opportunities, Karvy would drive the Managed Services and technical support.


 


HCLI is all geared to grow again, We have an incredible foundation to build
upon, and we will combine the best of today with new innovation and
investments to build the best future for HCL Infosystems, our partners and
our customers. We have recalibrated and moved into areas of greater value.
The entire vision is to build a highly productive organization where every
employee is strongly business aligned and contributing towards driving
greater business value. A business construct that most of the successful
organizations in the world have been gearing towards. I urge you all to
focus on the future journey and be part of a successful transformation.
Given how quickly we and our markets are moving, I am committed to sharing
openly and transparently what I am seeing and where we are going


 


Warm Regards

Dr. Nikhil Sinha
Non-Executive Chairman
HCL Infosystems

Subject: BRE reimbursement claims online thru Alt ( People Strong ) Portal
Body:
cid:image001.jpg@01D3D8B8.9D9D4C30

 

Dear HCLites,

 

 

 

RESTRICTION FOR CASH MODE OF PAYMENT EXCEEDING RS 10,000-00

 

 

 

This is to inform all the employees that the facility of reimbursing claims
exceeding Rs 10,000-00 incurred / claimed thru cash mode of payment against
all business related expenses is being discontinued as per income tax rules
with immediate effect from 20th April 2018. 

 

 

 

All employees are thereby advised to note & make payments thru other than
cash mode of payments towards business related expenses and get it
reimbursed post claim approval.

 

 

 

Finance Shared Services Team

	
	



cid:image005.jpg@01D12602.B5F18730

Subject: Organsization Announcement
Body:
HCL Infotech Ltd.

ORGANIZATION-ANNOUNCEMENT

 


	
	Text Box: Welcome Inderjeet Singh Narang	 
 


                

 

                                                                         

   

                        

 

Dear Team,

I am delighted to welcome Inderjeet Singh Narang as Delivery Manager -
UIDAI.  Inderjeet has over 16+ years of varying experience in managing
delivery in multiple organizations.

Inderjeet has previously worked with Planet's Brain Software, NIIT
Technologies FIS , wherein he has performed the role of Delivery
Manager.Inderjeet is a certified Prince2 Practitioner (Projects in
controlled environment)

He will be operating out of Bangalore by providing leadership for Bangalore
application development, application maintenance, and testing team by
working along with Pranav and Pankaj. All Bangalore application development,
maintenance and testing team will be aligned under him for effective
governance and control. He will be reporting to Amit Arora.  

He is a sports enthusiast and in his free time likes to spend time with his
family visiting places.

He is very excited about taking on this role and can be reached at
+91-95385-44507 or on  <mailto:inderjeet.narang@hcl.com>
inderjeet.narang@hcl.com

 

Regards,

 

Rajesh Patel

Program Director, UIDAI MSP

Vice President

HCL Infotech Limited

Subject: Goals for 2016-17

Hello all,

 

Please find the goals for 2016-17. Please submit the goals in the EmpTrackx
tool.

 

Do talk to your manager for any clarifications.

 

Team Lead

 


Business Priorities

Goal Statement

Description

Measurement comment

Weightage


Services

SLA Adherence

Ensure zero SLA loss on Delivered Defect Density, Schedule Variance 

.          No major or critical defects for the project in Staging/UAT/Prod.

.          Adherence to agreed schedules.

.          No impact misses during the design phase which will impact
schedule/cost

30%


Process

Implementation of S/W processes

SDLC compliance

 

1.        NC in internal and external audits

2.        Project FP Project Documentation completion

3.        Contribution in Designs - No of HLDs delivered

4.        Turnaround time for defects

5.        Review Effectiveness

6.         End to end project ownership

30%


Compliance

Management reports, Timesheet, Attendance

PMO reports or delinquency reports

10%


People

Self/Team

Team/Self Growth

.          Additional areas picked up/supported in a year

.          Technical Certifications per year

.          No of team members mentored in the year

30%

Subject: Employee Referral Scheme | Enterprise Distribution | Sales Specialists
Good Bye time.... :(
Body:
Hello All,



I want to bid farewell to you all and inform you that I am leaving my position . Today is my last day at work.



I have enjoyed working for this company and I appreciate having had this wonderful opportunity to work with you all.



During these last 6 years, you all have provided me support and through your encouragement and guidance I have been able to excel at the projects offered to me.



With many of you, I have shared a unique camaraderie which I hope will continue in the years to come even though I shall not be here with the company.



I now look forward to this new position that brings forth new challenges and adds more diverse experience to my career.



I do wish you and the company every success in all its future endeavors.



I can be reached at my personal email address (shelender.kandola@gmail.com) and Mobile number:9663004661



Thanks and Regards,

Shelender Kandola

Subject: OFFBOARDIING PROCESS- UIDAI
Body:
Dear Team,

 

Any exit will NOT BE COMPLETE for any UIDAI employee without  following
email approvals from respective people below, who will  then send email to
HR (copying both Oindrila and Smrita) so that they can verify if all the
approvals are received.  For outgoing he may need to come back after 1 week
of his last date so that HR can conduct exit formalities.  (We can only
remove access on last day of his notice period). 

 

1.       First Level, Abhishek Srivastava (SRIVASTAVAABHISHEK@HCL.COM)
(Employee should write to Abhishek for Application Security Clearance 1 week
in advance against his/last date)

smrita.gupta@hcl.com)

Dear Vicky, 

This is not the way to talk to clients or anybody. Issues like this are to be escalated to company admin copying HR. There is a process for everything. I could understand that you might have lost a very expensive headphone, but expressing it in this way is totally unacceptable. 

Going forward please don't mark such mails for this kind of issues directly to the client rather take help from our admin to get things sorted. 

Regards, 
Oindrila Chakrabarty

Subject: POLICY CHANGE UPDATE: Domestic Travel Policy
Body:
cid:image001.jpg@01D2EC07.2200A700

 

Dear HCLites,

 

 

POLICY CHANGE UPDATE: Domestic Travel Policy

 

This is to inform you that the Domestic Travel Policy has been revised and
is effective from 22nd May 2018.

 

Key Features of the policy:-

.         Online bill submission on HRMYPAL Portal captured in policy,
instead of Hard copy submission.

.         NE States/Pune/Ahmedabad have been moved to Tier 2 city from Tier
1.

.         No Changes in Travel Quantum.

 

 

For more details, please refer to the policy available at
<https://intranet.hclinsys.com> https://intranet.hclinsys.com

Go to: Enable >> People Practices >> Policies and Forms >> Travel >> India -
Domestic Travel Policy.

 

In case you have any queries regarding the policy changes, kindly get in
touch with your respective BU HR SPOC.

 

Regards

Body:
Dear Vicky Kumar Jaiswal , 
We have initiated the payment for Your Domiciliary Claim with number 16974963 through Electronic Fund Transfer as per the bank account details provided to us. Please find attached Claim Payment Initiation Advice for your claim amount of INR10500
The Fund Transfer may take Maximum 72 hours from today and please check your Bank Account for credit as per the attached Letter. In case of non-credit of the amount, please write to float@mediassistindia.com

Assuring you of our best services always

Subject: Digitally Signed Form 16 for FY 2017-18
Body:
Dear HCLite,

Please find attached part A/Part B (as applicable) of your Form 16 for the
year ended 31st March, 2018 for the assessment year 2018-19.

As a part of our eco-friendly initiative, this year also we are sending
digitally signed Form 16.(Note: As per Income Tax Department Circular No. 2
Dated 21st May, 2007, our company is permitted to issue Form 16 which has
been signed with Digital Signature). However, No separate hardcopies of Form16 will be given.

Additionally, to assist you with filing of tax returns we have invited
TaxSpanner, the leading electronic tax advisory firm in India. TaxSpanner
brings you the fastest electronic tax filing solution, helping you to file
your return in minutes through their website www.taxspanner.com.


Important Note:

Your Form 16 document is password protected; the password will be your DOB
in ddmmyyyy format. For example, if DOB is 5-jan-1980, then the password
will be 05011980.

We recommend to use Adobe Acrobat 7 or above to view the document. The older
version of Acrobat Reader does not support the digital signature feature to
the fullest extent and may distort the signature. Therefore, You can
validate the digital signature in your Form 16 by following the steps
provided below. However it is not mandatory to validate signature as
digitally signed Form 16 is valid without validating signatures.

Please note the green tick mark will appear on the signature with Adobe
Acrobat Version 8 or below and with new version of Adobe Acrobat Version
(Version 9 or above), the green tick mark will appear on the signature panel
at the top.

You can validate the digital signature in your form 16 by following the
steps provided below:

1. Open the attached form 16, go to first page of the form 16, you will see
digital signature as validity unknown..

2. Keep the cursor on "Validity unknown" and right click and select
"Validate Signature", then click on "Signature Properties".

3. Further click on the "Show Certificate", then click on "Trust", then
click on "Add to Trusted Identities... " and select "Ok".

4. Further select "Ok" and close all the windows, you will see digital
signature as "Signature Valid" with a tick mark.


With Best Regards,
Payroll Finance Shared Services Team
::DISCLAIMER::
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
The contents of this e-mail and any attachment(s) are confidential and intended for the named recipient(s) only. E-mail transmission is not guaranteed to be secure or
error-free as information could be intercepted, corrupted, lost, destroyed, arrive late or incomplete, or may contain viruses in transmission. The e mail and its contents
(with or without referred errors) shall therefore not attach any liability on the originator or HCL or its affiliates. Views or opinions, if any, presented in this email are
solely those of the author and may not necessarily reflect the views or opinions of HCL or its affiliates. Any form of reproduction, dissemination, copying, disclosure,
modification, distribution and / or publication of this message without the prior written consent of authorized representative of HCL is strictly prohibited. If you have
received this email in error please delete it and notify the sender immediately. Before opening any email and/or attachments, please check them for viruses and other
defects.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Subject: Secure Business Information By Adhering To Email Security
Goodbye and Good Luck!
Body:
*Hi,*

*After almost 2.5 years of exciting and memorable stint with HCL, I am
bidding adieu today to this company to pursue other career opportunities.*

*As I move on, I would like to take a moment to remember and cherish our
times together. My tenure in this organization has been worthwhile and
rewarding in every sense & it’s been great interacting and knowing each one
of you.*

*I prefer to think of this as “See you later” instead of “Goodbye.” So,
please don’t hesitate to reach out to me at oindrila.2490@gmail.com
<oindrila.2490@gmail.com> or buzz me at 9836264850 if you’d ever like to
get in touch. I will be glad to hear from you all even after my departure. *

* I wish this organization and all of you a very bright and successful
future.*



*Regards,*
Oindrila Chakrabarty

Subject: Organization Announcement||Welcome Kavya Agarwal
Body:
HCL Infotech Ltd.

ORGANIZATION-ANNOUNCEMENT

             cid:164260df4c4a0342b2f1         

 


	
	Text Box: Welcome Kavya Agarwal	 
 


 


 

 

Dear Team,

 

I am Delighted to Welcome Kavya Agarwal as Business HR Partner  for UIDAI
Bangalore.

 

Kavya has 3 +years of experience and has  previously worked  with Outworks
Solutions ,where she was handling  end to end HR as  Business HR and HR
Generalist. Prior to that she has worked in organizations like  Nextgen
Infotech and Project Objects and was part of the HR operations team.

 

Kavya has completed her  MBA from University of Bedfordshire, UK
specializing  in ITM and HR and has also completed her B.Tech.

 

On the personal front Kavya loves to travel and explore new places and is a
sports enthusiast as well ..

 

She can be contacted on kavya. <mailto:kavya.agarwal@hcl.com>
agarwal@hcl.com or on 9148566162.

 

Please join me in wishing Kavya all the best as she takes over this role
from Oindrila who has decided to explore an opportunity outside HCL.

 

Regards,

Rajiv

Subject: ITR Filing Help desk for the year ended 31st March 2018
Body:
This communication is intended for Employees based in India | For Internal
Circulation 



cid:image012.jpg@01D2EB45.006F9870



Dear HCLites,

Like every year, we have set up a Helpdesk together with our ITR filing
partner, Tax Spanner to assist you in filing your income tax returns for
year ending 31st March 2018. The last date to submit your return is 31st
July 2018. 

 

Kindly refer the schedule for various offices. 

 


Location

Schedule of Dates (11:00 AM - 5:30 PM)


Kaveri Conference Room, 

Sector 11, Noida 

Dates for July 2018: 

6th, 9th,11th,16th,18th, 23rd, 25th and 27th


Technology Hub, SEZ, Plot no 3A Sector 126, Noida 201304 

Dates for July 2018: 5th and 9th 


G 8/9, Sector 3, Noida-201301 

Dates for July 2018: 5th and 20th

 

 

                        


3rd Floor Boomerang 

Andheri (E) Mumbai

 Dates for July 2018: 6th, 13th, 20th, 24th and 27th 

 

KEY TAX CHANGES 

 

.         This year there is Rs. 5000 penalty for not filing returns by July
31, 2018. Penalty increases to Rs. 10000 after Dec 31.

 

Quick Steps to file your e-return:

 

.         Complete your tax documents & submit at helpdesk

.         Financial advisor prepares your ITR and email it to you

.         Review your ITR and print a copy

.         Sign the copy & deposit in drop box at Reception 

 

For more details, refer the attached document.

 

 

Payroll Finance Shared services Team

Subject: RE: Solr Upgrade - Review
Body:
Status/Action Items on Tuesday
1.      Infra setup of 6.3 completed on both the servers.
2.      Zookeeper installation also completed
3.      Basic installation and integration done
4.      Shards and clusters to be completed
5.      Should not have any embedded Zookeeper but external Zookeeper
6.      Merging logic incorporated in 1.4 and to be completed for 6.3
7.      Branch creation to be done
8.      SEDA and ASAPI using different branch. Hence, code to be merged for both before branch creation

Status/Action Items on Friday
1.      Infra setup done, facing some issue with Zookeeper details to be shared by Amit with Nitin
2.      Merging logic from framework incorporated  for new packets to be done for update packets
3.      Branch creation to be done and initiate code merge activity for SEDA and ASAPI.

Need to get updates for ASAPI changes. Vicky and Priya were not able to join because of clash of calls. Hence the time of the meeting has been updated to 11:30am. In case anyone has conflict with any other calls please inform accordingly.



Regards
Neeti

Subject: SAP System Downtime Notification
Body:
cid:image001.jpg@01D2EC07.2200A700

 

Dear HClites,

 

SAP SYSTEM DOWNTIME NOTIFICATION   

 

We are undertaking up-gradation of our SAP ECC system. During the activity,
the SAP ECC will not be available. Other systems dependent upon integration
with SAP ECC like MDM, DMS (Content Server), CRM, BI (ECC Reports), Intranet
will be partially available with impact on some of the dependent services.
You are requested to kindly note the same and plan your activities
accordingly 

 

 

 

Activity Window

Start Time: Saturday, 7th July 2018 | 02:30 PM IST

End Time: Monday , 9th July 2018 | 08:00 AM IST

 

Once the activity is completed, we will send out a notification confirming
the completion. If in case you face any issue post completion of the
activity, feel free to contact the MIS HelpDesk.

 

Regards,

 

MIS Helpdesk

0120 - 4203166 

 <mailto:mishelpdesk@hcl.com> mishelpdesk@hcl.com

Status/Action Items on Tuesday
1.      Infra setup of 6.3 completed on both the servers.
2.      Zookeeper installation also completed
3.      Basic installation and integration done
4.      Shards and clusters to be completed
5.      Should not have any embedded Zookeeper but external Zookeeper
6.      Merging logic incorporated in 1.4 and to be completed for 6.3
7.      Branch creation to be done
8.      SEDA and ASAPI using different branch. Hence, code to be merged for both before branch creation

Status/Action Items on Friday
1.      Infra setup done, facing some issue with Zookeeper details to be shared by Amit with Nitin
2.      Merging logic from framework incorporated  for new packets to be done for update packets
3.      Branch creation to be done and initiate code merge activity for SEDA and ASAPI.

Need to get updates for ASAPI changes. Vicky and Priya were not able to join because of clash of calls. Hence the time of the meeting has been updated to 11:30am. In case anyone has conflict with any other calls please inform accordingly.



Regards
Neeti

Body:
Dear HClites , 

 

This is a gentle reminder , in case you need to plan your  activities
considering the  downtime as notified earlier.     

The SAP ECC and other dependent systems like MDM , DMS (Content server) ,
CRM , BI (ECC Reports) , Intranet (Partial) , will not be available from
Saturday(7th July'2018 : 02:30 PM IST) to Monday (9th July'2018 : 08:00 AM
IST) . 

 

Regards

MIS Helpdesk

 

 

From: mishelpdesk [mailto:mishelpdesk@hcl.com] 
Sent: Thursday, June 28, 2018 9:50 PM
To: mladmin@hcl.com
Subject: SAP System Downtime Notification 

 



cid:image001.jpg@01D2EC07.2200A700

 

Dear HClites,

 

SAP SYSTEM DOWNTIME NOTIFICATION   

 

We are undertaking up-gradation of our SAP ECC system. During the activity,
the SAP ECC will not be available. Other systems dependent upon integration
with SAP ECC like MDM, DMS (Content Server), CRM, BI (ECC Reports), Intranet
will be partially available with impact on some of the dependent services.
You are requested to kindly note the same and plan your activities
accordingly

End Time: Monday , 9th July 2018 | 08:00 AM IST

the completion. If in case you face any issue post completion of the
activity, feel free to contact the MIS HelpDesk.

 

Regards,

Subject: ITR Filing Help desk for the year ended 31st March 2018
Body:
This communication is intended for Employees based in India | For Internal
Circulation 



cid:image012.jpg@01D2EB45.006F9870



Dear HCLites,

Like every year, we have set up a Helpdesk together with our ITR filing
partner, Tax Spanner to assist you in filing your income tax returns for
year ending 31st March 2018. The last date to submit your return is 31st
July 2018. 

 

Kindly refer the schedule for various offices. 

 


Location

Schedule of Dates (11:00 AM - 5:30 PM)


Kaveri Conference Room, 

Sector 11, Noida 

Dates for July 2018: 

6th, 9th,11th,16th,18th, 23rd, 25th and 27th


Technology Hub, SEZ, Plot no 3A Sector 126, Noida 201304 

Dates for July 2018: 5th and 9th 


G 8/9, Sector 3, Noida-201301 

Dates for July 2018: 5th and 20th

 

 

                        


3rd Floor Boomerang 

Andheri (E) Mumbai

 Dates for July 2018: 6th, 13th, 20th, 24th and 27th 

 

KEY TAX CHANGES 

 

.         This year there is Rs. 5000 penalty for not filing returns by July
31, 2018. Penalty increases to Rs. 10000 after Dec 31.

 

Quick Steps to file your e-return:

 

.         Complete your tax documents & submit at helpdesk

.         Financial advisor prepares your ITR and email it to you

.         Review your ITR and print a copy

.         Sign the copy & deposit in drop box at Reception 

 

For more details, refer the attached document.

 

 

Payroll Finance Shared services Team

I will check with my manager on the relieving date and update you ASAP.

On Fri, Jul 6, 2018, 4:52 PM Gaurav Pant <gaurav.pant@hcl.com<mailto:gaurav.pant@hcl.com>> wrote:
Dear  Rahmatullah,



Congratulations on your selection as   Consultant with HCL.

We are excited to welcome you on-board! Please find enclosed your formal Offer Letter.

This email details out all essential information to facilitate a smooth on-boarding process. This will also help us plan for your joining in advance and give you a better experience.



1.       On-boarding Details


Kindly take a note of your date of joining and other essential details.

Date of Joining: 20th Aug 2018
Time of Joining:  10:00 AM
Reporting Manager:  Mr. Inderjeet Narang
HR SPOC: Kavya
HR SPOC Contact Details: kavya.agarwal@hcl.com<mailto:kavya.agarwal@hcl.com>


2.       Official Address for Day 1 Reporting

You are requested to report at the following address 20th Aug 2018

                     UIDAI Tech Center,
                     1st Main Rd, Tatanagar,
                     Devinagar, Bengaluru,
                     Karnataka 560094


3.       Work location :

                     UIDAI Tech Center,
                     1st Main Rd, Tatanagar,
                     Devinagar, Bengaluru,
                     Karnataka 560094



4.       Documents for Submission

You will shortly receive an email from our partner Peoplestrong with a link to upload following mandatory documents.


•         Educational Documents: Copy of 10th, 12th, Graduation, Post-Graduation or any other Diploma mark sheets, pass certificates and degrees

•         I-Tax & Bank Proofs: Copy of PAN Card; Cancelled cheque of HDFC or ICICI or IndusInd Bank (If currently held, else new account to be opened) in original hard copy.

•         Address Proof: Copy of Passport/ Voter ID/ Driving license

•         Employment Documents:

o   Acceptance of Resignation from current employer;

o   Relieving letter /Experience certificates from the last 2 employers indicating the Date of Joining, Date of Leaving, last designation etc.;

o   Signed Appointment letters of all the previous employers

o   Last 3 months’ Salary Slips

•         Photographs: 5 Passport size photographs




NOTE: If in case you face any technical issue in uploading the above documents, kindly courier them at the appended address:



Address:-
HCLI HRSS Onboarding Team
Peoplestrong HR Services PVT LTD
A 10 Infocity, Sector 34, Gurgaon-122001

Please be informed that if the above documents are not submitted 3 days prior to your Date of Joining, then your joining dates will be deferred.




5.       Forms for Official-Use
Following forms must be filled to fulfill all your joining requirements.  All the sections on all the forms are significant and must be detailed. Please submit these forms on your date of joining (DOJ).


•         Smart Card/ID Card Form

•         Employment Application Form

•         Transfer Forms & Nomination Form for PF and Gratuity

•         Code of Conduct (Please sign on every page of the document)


6.       Please note that this offer letter is valid with subject to receiving your resignation acceptance with current employer within 7 days .



7.       Background Verification
We have engaged the services of an agency to process of your Background verification. The documents furnished by you will be used to complete the verification process. They may reach out to you directly in case they want some added information. We request you to cooperate in order to complete this process smoothly.


8.       Pre-Induction Module:
HCL Infosystems pre-Induction module is designed as an introductory information pool for HCL Infosystems.
Please Note: It is mandatory to attempt the pre-Induction module in order to attend the Classroom Induction Program. Do not share your login information further.

       a. Steps to register for Pre-Induction Module:
•        Click on the following link to register: http://www.ezae.in/v2/userSignup.php?aid=65&cid=65&lpfId=62
•        From your ‘Appointment Letter’, fill out the required information (i.e. Name, level, Designation etc.) to begin you online  gamified pre-induction session.

        b. Suggested guidelines for your Online Gamified Pre-Induction Session:
•        For an effective session, It is advisable to complete the training in one sitting.
                  •        This training is voice enabled, you may use your headphones. To update your flash player, please click:  https://get.adobe.com/flashplayer/

At any point in time, please feel free to reach out to me; we will be glad to help and make on-boarding a delightful experience for you.

Wishing you luck and a rewarding career at HCL Infosystems!



Thanks & Regards,
Gaurav Pant ,
Talent Attractor – India & Overseas
HCL Infosystems
E-4,5,6 Sector 11,
Noida

Subject: RE: Solr Upgrade - Review
Body:
MOM for the call-
1.      Clarification to be done for SEDA interceptor, QC stage and Mongosync stage with the SEDA team
2.      For the ASAPI, the Solr query will be formed at runtime and in the already provided framework only the right indexed params to be passed for the formation of the query.Vicky to discuss with Amit and Pankaj on the same.
3.      HLD, next version to be released by Wednesday,25th July.
4.
Team - I have already sent an email to Arun and Deepak for discussion of Point 1. Let me know of you face any difficulties.

@Nitin - Please add for a miss.


Thanks.
Neeti

Subject: SAP Systems Downtime Notification
Body:
Dear HClites,

 

Disaster Recovery Drill Activity for SAP Application

 

This is to inform you that we are undertaking Disaster Recovery Drill
activity for SAP Application. During this activity, the SAP Servers at main
Data Centre in Noida will not be available. The Mock Drill activity will be
performed on separate DR platform.  As such, the following live services
will be unavailable.  Request you to please plan your operations
accordingly.

 

Planned Activity

DR Drill for SAP Application

 

Reason of Activity

To validate  Disaster Recovery Setup for SAP Applications.

 

Activity Window

Start Time                  :             Sunday , August 12 , 2018 06:00
hrs

End Time                   :             Sunday , August 12, 2018 19:00 hrs


Total Downtime         :             13 Hrs [ Non- Working Hours]

 

Services Impacted

ECC 6.0 Server: The  Processes working on SAP ECC 6.0 (e.g. Procure to Pay,
Order to Cash, Accounts, Payouts, Banking,  SCM, Master Management  etc.)
will not be available.

 

CRM Services:  Processes like Contract Management, Service Order Creation,
Quotation Creation etc. will not be available.

 

BI Reports: BI Server will not be populated with new data during downtime
period .

 

Other Applications:  Other Applications integrated with SAP will also be
impacted during this period.  Such impacted applications includes MDM,  SMS
Delivery , Intranet , FFA , Touch CRM , Integration with Partner
Applications etc.

 

Post Scheduled Activity Completion

Once the activity is completed, we will send out a notification confirming
the completion. If in case you face any issue post completion of the
activity, feel free to contact the MIS HelpDesk.

 

Regards,

 

MIS Helpdesk

0120 - 4203166

Subject: Independence Day Celebration!!
Body:
Dear All,

 

Let us all come together to celebrate Freedom day with pure synergy to work
for the betterment of our country, to respect our diversity and honor the
sacrifices by our national leaders , Warm wishes on Independence Day.

 

With this motive in the heart, HCL Infotech decides to celebrate the
"Independence Day" on 14th August, 2018. To lift up the spirits of this
Freedom Day, it would be excited to wear "Ethnic" attire full of colors with
joyous smile.

 

The celebration aided by the entertainment and lots of fun and laughter. To
make it extra special, "Best dressed Woman" and "Best dressed Man" will be
awarded.

 

Image result for independence day
 

Regards,

 

Kavya Agarwal

Human Resources

HCL Infotech Limited

Mob: +9148566162

 <http://www.hclinfosystems.com/> www.hclinfosystems.com

Subject: Income Certificate Required || Financial Year 18-19
Body:
Dear All,

 

As per income tax rules you need to declare your income and savings details
for entire year  (1st April'18 to 31st March'19 ) for correct calculation of
Income tax and TDS deduction.

 

To ensure that your income tax calculations are correct this year, you are
requested to submit  income certificate containing details of Gross Salary,
deduction, exemption and TDS deducted from all your previous employer(s) if
you have joined HCL on or after 1st May - 2018.

 

The Income certificate should be duly signed and stamped by all your
ex-employer (s) and same is to be shared with us by 22nd August,2018, else
we shall  annualize the existing  salary for employment with the company for
the  purpose of tax deduction.

 

Please send your Income certificate to Deepak Tandon @ deep@hcl.com

 

 

With Regards,

Finance - Shared Services

 

	
	


cid:image005.jpg@01D12602.B5F18730

Subject: Raising Hand for Kerala!!
Body:
Dear HCLite,

As you might be aware, the ongoing severe rainfall and floods in the
southern state of Kerala has caused havoc in over 14 districts and taking a
huge toll on lives and livelihood of its people. Around 80 people have lost
their lives and close to 70,000 people have been moved to relief camps. The
situation calls for an urgent civic action and participation. It is time we
join hands to support the humanitarian action by HCL. 

There is urgent requirement of below things mentioned and we request you to
contribute by the utmost efforts. The following things can be donated to
assist various people out there. These items will be sent through the Goonj
Centres at the respective locations which are affected by the flood. PFB the
list of requirements:

.         Dry Ration (Rice, pulses, spices, sugar, salt, tea, milk powder,
dry snacks

.         Clothings for all ages: Sarees, Shirts Pants, New Under Garments

.         Footwears, Cooking utensils, bucket, torch and batteries,
Umbrellas, Bedsheets, blankets, Rain Coat, Match-Box, Candles, Mats, Tooth
Brush, Tooth paste, Sanitary Pads, medicines.

.         For Children: Items like drawing books, colors, toys, pencils,
erasers, notebooks, bags, storybooks, games etc. These items might distract
them in this vague conditions and help in engaging them in these activities
whoch will be helpful to recover from these traumic conditions. 

Plesae drop these items in Collcetion boxes placed at the first floor
reception. We request you to drop all the required items by 20th August,
2018. 

 

For money, either drop in Dropbox at Reception or PhonePe or Tez

 

Please contact below volunteers for more details:

 

1st Floor:                              Deepika (9566750101) & Ajitha
(9901157736)

2nd and 3rd Floor :             Tony (9995582587) and Archa (9591007067)

 

Looking for the utmost contribution. 

 

 

Regards,

 

Kavya Agarwal

Human Resources

HCL Infotech Limited

Mob: +9148566162

 <http://www.hclinfosystems.com/> www.hclinfosystems.com

Subject: RE: Raising Hand for Kerala!!
Body:
Dear All,

 

We are sending all donated items for “Kerala & Karnataka Flood Relief”
through ‘HAL Bangalore and Kerala Samaaj’. Also funds collected (total
amount of Rs 9650/- through PhonePe and TEZ) have been transferred to CM
Karnataka and CM Kerala Relief Fund accounts. PFA receipts for your
reference. 

 

HCL appreciate all the efforts made by you all. Hoping for the recovery of
Kerala and Karanata. Also, HCL would like to give special thanks  great
applause for the volunteers. 

 

Thanks you all for the generous donations and effortsJ 

 

Regards,

 

Kavya Agarwal

Human Resources

HCL Infotech Limited

Mob: +9148566162

 <http://www.hclinfosystems.com/> www.hclinfosystems.com  

 

From: kavya [mailto:kavya.agarwal@hcl.com] 
Sent: 21 August, 2018 11:42 AM
To: 'kavya'
Cc: 'RAJESHPATEL@HCL.COM'
Subject: RE: Raising Hand for Kerala!!

 

Hello All,

 

Today is the final day for all the donations whosoever wants to make it as a
helping hand for Kerala/Karnataka. Please close this today by EOD.

 

Regards

Kavya

 

From: kavya [mailto:kavya.agarwal@hcl.com] 
Sent: 17 August, 2018 4:17 PM
To: 'kavya'
Cc: 'RAJESHPATEL@HCL.COM'
Subject: RE: Raising Hand for Kerala!!

 

Dear All,

 

For the PhonePe and TEZ transfer, please find below the details for the
respective platforms:

 

Ø  PhonePe Transfer

Phone No:8800425732

 

Ø  TEZ Transfer:

Phone No:8800425732

 

Please mail me separately once you make any transaction mentioning the
details. 

 

Regards

Kavya

 

From: kavya [mailto:kavya.agarwal@hcl.com] 
Sent: 17 August, 2018 1:14 PM
To: 'kavya'
Cc: 'RAJESHPATEL@HCL.COM'
Subject: Raising Hand for Kerala!!

 

Dear HCLite,

As you might be aware, the ongoing severe rainfall and floods in the
southern state of Kerala has caused havoc in over 14 districts and taking a
huge toll on lives and livelihood of its people. Around 80 people have lost
their lives and close to 70,000 people have been moved to relief camps. The
situation calls for an urgent civic action and participation. It is time we
join hands to support the humanitarian action by HCL. 

There is urgent requirement of below things mentioned and we request you to
contribute by the utmost efforts. The following things can be donated to
assist various people out there. These items will be sent through the Goonj
Centres at the respective locations which are affected by the flood. PFB the
list of requirements:

·         Dry Ration (Rice, pulses, spices, sugar, salt, tea, milk powder,
dry snacks

·         Clothings for all ages: Sarees, Shirts Pants, New Under Garments

·         Footwears, Cooking utensils, bucket, torch and batteries,
Umbrellas, Bedsheets, blankets, Rain Coat, Match-Box, Candles, Mats, Tooth
Brush, Tooth paste, Sanitary Pads, medicines.

·         For Children: Items like drawing books, colors, toys, pencils,
erasers, notebooks, bags, storybooks, games etc. These items might distract
them in this vague conditions and help in engaging them in these activities
whoch will be helpful to recover from these traumic conditions. 

Plesae drop these items in Collcetion boxes placed at the first floor
reception. We request you to drop all the required items by 20th August,
2018. 

 

For money, either drop in Dropbox at Reception or PhonePe or Tez

 

Please contact below volunteers for more details:

 

1st Floor:                              Deepika (9566750101) & Ajitha
(9901157736)

2nd and 3rd Floor :             Tony (9995582587) and Archa (9591007067)

 

Looking for the utmost contribution. 

 

 

Regards,

 

Kavya Agarwal

Human Resources

HCL Infotech Limited

Mob: +9148566162

 <http://www.hclinfosystems.com/> www.hclinfosystems.com

Subject: Communication-Bharat Bandh- 10th September, 2018
Body:
Dear All,

 

A political party has declared "Bharat Bandh" tomorrow, September 10, 2018.
Transport Services like BMTC buses, KSRTC buses, cabs  and Auto-rickshaws
are supporting the Bandh  and will stay off the roads. 

 

Therefore, this is to inform you that HCL has decided to keep off tomorrow
10th September, 2018 for employees working only at UIDAI office (Hebbal,
Bangalore) as most of the government and private transport services are not
running tomorrow in lieu of Bharat Bandh. As per the guidelines, we will be
working on Saturday 15th September, 2018 as compensatory off. 

 

Only business critical people will be working tomorrow to support the
operations. Those will be informed by their respective Managers. 

 

Managers:Please disseminate this communication to all their respective
reportees and especially who have joined recently.

 

Regards,

 

Kavya Agarwal

Human Resources

HCL Infotech Limited

Mob: +9148566162

 <http://www.hclinfosystems.com/> www.hclinfosystems.com

To verify, simply click on the link below:

Verify email <http://mybiz.makemytrip.com/userverify?corp_email=dmlja3kuamFpc3dhbEBoY2wuY29t&verification_code=SDdDTnYyZg%3D%3D> . 



*	Zero Paperwork
*	Mission Control 
*	Simple Analytics 


Your colleagues will also be happy with how myBiz makes their life easy.



*	Corporate Benefits -Free meals, room upgrades, flexible cancellations, custom hotel rates. 
*	Easy Reimbursements- Easy to expense with instant approvals and invoices. 
*	Dedicated Helpline - 24x7 toll-free customer helpline for business travel 


Happy travels!

Best regards,
The myBiz Team
MakeMyTrip

Subject: Welcome Mail for Group Medical Coverage 2018-19
Body:
Dear Vicky Kumar Jaiswal,

GREETINGS FROM MEDI ASSIST!!!!! 

We are pleased to inform you that we are the Third Party Administrator for your Group Medical Insurance Policy issued by The Oriental Insurance Company Limited. You can enroll your dependents for Group Medical Coverage 2018-19 through our Online Enrolment Module. 

Last day for Enrolment is 15th October 2018.

To enroll, please follow the process indicated below:

1.	Login to HCL Intranet portal -> Mediassist portal
2.	Click on Policy Enrolment to begin Enrolment for the current year 2018-19
3.	Eligible members for enrolment (1 + 7): You can cover following:

	*	Your spouse
	*	Two dependent children
	*	Dependent parents or dependent parents-in-law (Only one set of parents or parents-in-law can be enrolled)
	*	Unmarried and unemployed dependent sister
	*	Unmarried and unemployed dependent brother. Children and Brother will be covered till the age of 25 years only.

4.	Post checking details of all your dependents as entered on the portal, click on the  Confirm button. Then click Ok  on the pop up appearing on the browser. Once confirmed, your data will be saved and you will not be allowed to make any changes to it. Hence be sure of the entered data before clicking on the  Confirm Button.
5.	You can opt for additional Top up Cover of 1 Lac, 2 Lac, 3 Lac, 4 Lac or 5 Lac. Premium Charges for the same are indicated below:

Base Sum Insured Limits (Deductible to the Top Up) 

Top Up Sum Insured ( In INR) 

1,00,000

2,00,000

3,00,000

4,00,000

5,00,000

Premium (with Tax) 

3,732

Subject: Reminder_Welcome Mail for Group Medical Coverage 2018-19
Body:
Dear Vicky Kumar Jaiswal,

GREETINGS FROM MEDI ASSIST!!!!! 

We are pleased to inform you that we are the Third Party Administrator for your Group Medical Insurance Policy issued by The Oriental Insurance Company Limited. You can enroll your dependents for Group Medical Coverage 2018-19 through our Online Enrolment Module. 

Last day for Enrolment is 15th October 2018.

To enroll, please follow the process indicated below:

1.	Login to HCL Intranet portal -> Mediassist portal
2.	Click on Policy Enrolment to begin Enrolment for the current year 2018-19
3.	Eligible members for enrolment (1 + 7): You can cover following:

	*	Your spouse
	*	Two dependent children
	*	Dependent parents or dependent parents-in-law (Only one set of parents or parents-in-law can be enrolled)
	*	Unmarried and unemployed dependent sister
	*	Unmarried and unemployed dependent brother. Children and Brother will be covered till the age of 25 years only.

4.	Post checking details of all your dependents as entered on the portal, click on the  Confirm button. Then click Ok  on the pop up appearing on the browser. Once confirmed, your data will be saved and you will not be allowed to make any changes to it. Hence be sure of the entered data before clicking on the  Confirm Button.
5.	You can opt for additional Top up Cover of 1 Lac, 2 Lac, 3 Lac, 4 Lac or 5 Lac. Premium Charges for the same are indicated below:

Base Sum Insured Limits (Deductible to the Top Up) 

Top Up Sum Insured ( In INR) 

1,00,000

2,00,000

3,00,000

4,00,000

5,00,000

Premium (with Tax) 

3,732

4,682

5,768

7,599

10,382

Top Up Premium will be deducted from the employees salary

For further details/ assistance in this regard, please write to hrservices@hcl.com <mailto:hrservices@hcl.com>  or hcl@mediassistindia.com <mailto:hcl@mediassistindia.com>  

Share following details while sending across the email:

1.       Your Name

3.       Your Contact number.

Medi Assist wishes you and your family "Good Health"!

Regards,

Team Medi Assist
