Subject: FW: Reminder_Welcome Mail for Group Medical Coverage 2018-19
Body:
Dear All
Request you to please confirm the dependents data in Med assist portal as per below mail.

Last day for Enrolment is 15th October 2018.
Thanks
Dear Sanjeev Swani,

GREETINGS FROM MEDI ASSIST!!!!!

We are pleased to inform you that we are the Third Party Administrator for your Group Medical Insurance Policy issued by The Oriental Insurance Company Limited. You can enroll your dependents for Group Medical Coverage 2018-19 through our Online Enrolment Module.

Last day for Enrolment is 15th October 2018.

To enroll, please follow the process indicated below:

  1.  Login to HCL Intranet portal -> Mediassist portal
  2.  Click on Policy Enrolment to begin Enrolment for the current year 2018-19
  3.  Eligible members for enrolment (1 + 7): You can cover following:
     *   Your spouse
     *   Two dependent children
     *   Dependent parents or dependent parents-in-law (Only one set of parents or parents-in-law can be enrolled)
     *   Unmarried and unemployed dependent sister
     *   Unmarried and unemployed dependent brother. Children and Brother will be covered till the age of 25 years only.
  4.  Post checking details of all your dependents as entered on the portal, click on the  Confirm button. Then click Ok  on the pop up appearing on the browser. Once confirmed, your data will be saved and you will not be allowed to make any changes to it. Hence be sure of the entered data before clicking on the  Confirm Button.
  5.  You can opt for additional Top up Cover of 1 Lac, 2 Lac, 3 Lac, 4 Lac or 5 Lac. Premium Charges for the same are indicated below:

Base Sum Insured Limits (Deductible to the Top Up)


Top Up Sum Insured ( In INR)


1,00,000


2,00,000


3,00,000


4,00,000


5,00,000


Premium (with Tax)


3,732


4,682


5,768


7,599


10,382


Top Up Premium will be deducted from the employees salary

For further details/ assistance in this regard, please write to hrservices@hcl.com<mailto:hrservices@hcl.com> or hcl@mediassistindia.com<mailto:hcl@mediassistindia.com>

Share following details while sending across the email:

1.       Your Name

2.       Your Employee ID

3.       Your Contact number.

For any other information with regards to Cashless Facility, Reimbursement Procedure or list of Network Hospitals, please visit mediassist website www.mediassistindia.com<https://apac01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.mediassistindia.com%2F&data=02%7C01%7CSswani%40Hcl.Com%7C419113bb93e64cb2d59708d63011faa2%7C189de737c93a4f5a8b686f4ca9941912%7C0%7C0%7C636749251120503035&sdata=cdaoiAND3WGI1U3Jmu8oVK439E93LjaGtGAxQJYxykw%3D&reserved=0>

Medi Assist wishes you and your family "Good Health"!
Regards,
Team Medi Assist

Subject: Exit Formalities!!
Body:
Hello Vicky,

 

PFA the exit forms which you have to submit to me. The attached off-boarding
form has to be signed by your manager. 

 

In case you want to withdraw PF , attach a cancelled cheque, Photocopy of
Aadhaar Card and Pan card with the forms(10c and 19) attached. Following is
the checklist which need to be get disabled before exit. 

 

1.       All UIDAI email id is de-activated.

2.       All UIDAI database access is de-activated

3.       All application access is de-activated.

4.       All UIDAI access card/ID card  is submitted.

5.       All code repository access has been removed.              

6.       All hardware access is removed

7.       All server access has been removed.

 

Please mark below mail ids in TO:. Once you get the approval please share it
with us.

 

nocblr@uidai.net.in

SUDHA.DODDABASAPPA@hcl.com

kumesh@hcl.com

Subject: [Ticket#2018102090417499] RE: Resignation Approved
Body:
Hi Vicky Jaiswal,

Thank you for contacting HRMYPAL Helpdesk. Your query has been registered with
the following ticket number 2018102090417499. Should you require any other
assistance on this query, please refer to your ticket number in your
communication to us. We will revert to you shortly with the update on your
query.
 
Key points:
Please mention your full name, employee code & business unit on each e-mail
that you send to hrmypal@hcl.com. This not only helps us in speedy retrieval
of your accurate data but also is essential for data security.
Working Days: We work 6 days a week as per below timings.
Monday to Friday: 09:00 AM to 06:00 PM
Saturday & Public Holidays: 09:00 AM to 01:00 PM
Query received during Sunday & after working hours will be responded the
following working day.
 
Have a nice day!
 
Regards
HRMYPAL Team

Toll Free: 1800 419 1331  
Email : [1]hrmypal@hcl.com


[1] mailto:hrmypal@hcl.com
